articles.headline: 'Further restrictions': Warning for NSW
articles.standfirst: NSW residents have been urged to think about their movements this weekend, with the premier warning she doesn't want to have to impose further restrictions.

articles.headline: Big W causes frenzy over $40 Nike sale
articles.standfirst: Big W has surprised shoppers by heavily discounting one of the most popular sporting brands, sending fans into a frenzy.

articles.headline: Brand removes controversial ingredient
articles.standfirst: The iconic Australian chocolate brand will change the ingredients for over 100 of its products â€“ and is now calling on other companies to do the same.
